title: Linux is good now
author: Vinnl
aiHeadline: Linux finally gets its act together after years of being the awkward, underappreciated sibling of the OS world, and now it's telling you to make 2026 the year it takes over your desktop—because clearly, you're not doing enough with your life.

title: Bluetooth Headphone Jacking: A Key to Your Phone [video]
author: AndrewDucker
aiHeadline: Bluetooth headphones are now the key to your phone's soul, and if you're not paranoid enough about your devices, here's your wake-up call: your earbuds could be the gateway to your digital life, and you're just sitting there, blissfully ignorant.

title: Show HN: OpenWorkers – Self-hosted Cloudflare workers in Rust
author: max_lt
aiHeadline: OpenWorkers: because who doesn't want to self-host their own Cloudflare workers in Rust? You're basically a wizard now, but with the added bonus of debugging in a language that looks like it was written by a cat walking on a keyboard.

title: iOS allows alternative browser engines in Japan
author: eklavya
aiHeadline: iOS lets Japan have alternative browser engines, because apparently, the land of the rising sun is the only place where users are allowed to have a choice—and you're not, because Apple knows best, except when they don't.

title: Cameras and Lenses (2020)
author: sebg
aiHeadline: Cameras and lenses: because who doesn't want to spend thousands of dollars on gear that makes you look like a professional photographer, even if you're just taking pictures of your cat sitting on a keyboard and wondering why your photos still suck.
